unnormalised: **Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark a Ray of Sunshine in Tamil Nadu**
normalised: **Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark a Ray of Sunshine in Tamil Nadu**

unnormalised: Chennai: Feeling the heat of rising electricity bills? Good news! The Tamil Nadu government is boosting solar rooftop subsidies, and it's easier than ever for homeowners like Mr. Sharma in Anna Nagar to make the switch.
normalised: Chennai: Feeling the heat of rising electricity bills? Good news! The Tamil Nadu government is boosting solar rooftop subsidies, and it's easier than ever for homeowners like Mister Sharma in Anna Nagar to make the switch.

unnormalised: The scheme, run in conjunction with TANGEDCO, offers substantial financial assistance, slashing the initial investment significantly. Think of it as a helping hand to harness the power of the sun!
normalised: The scheme, run in conjunction with T A N G E D C O, offers substantial financial assistance, slashing the initial investment significantly. Think of it as a helping hand to harness the power of the sun!

unnormalised: Dr. Kala, a renewable energy expert at IIT Madras, says the increased subsidy is a "game-changer," potentially driving adoption rates sky-high. For instance, a 5kW system covering roughly 500 sq ft could see a subsidy of up to Rs. 75,000, depending on the fine print.
normalised: Doctor Kala, a renewable energy expert at I I T Madras, says the increased subsidy is a "game-changer," potentially driving adoption rates sky-high. For instance, a five kilowatt system covering roughly five hundred square feet could see a subsidy of up to rupee seventy five thousand, depending on the fine print.

unnormalised: Plus, any surplus energy you generate goes back into the grid, earning you credits – talk about killing two birds with one stone! More information can be found on the MNRE website. It’s the perfect way to be eco-friendly and save some serious cash. So, ditch the darkness and embrace the power of Surya!
normalised: Plus, any surplus energy you generate goes back into the grid, earning you credits – talk about killing two birds with one stone! More information can be found on the M N R E website. It’s the perfect way to be eco-friendly and save some serious cash. So, ditch the darkness and embrace the power of Surya!
